languages.text: "У Глейто незначительные сбои при попытке сканировать здешние запахи — словно что-то влияет на его аугменты. Как же мне это не нравится..."
languages.translation_comment:
On Kiava Gamma.
Idira: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."

traits.locale_text: "У Глейто незначительные сбои при попытке сканировать здешние запахи — словно что-то влияет на его аугменты. Как же мне это не нравится..."

languages.text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."
languages.translation_comment:
On Kiava Gamma.
Idira: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."
languages.original_text: "У Глейто незначительные сбои при попытке сканировать здешние запахи — словно что-то влияет на его аугменты. Как же мне это не нравится..."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."
"Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."

"Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."

languages.text: 「グライトが周囲の臭気を分析しようとして、軽い機能不全を起こしている。まるで何かが彼のオーグメティックに干渉しているかのようだ。…どうにも嫌な感じがする」
languages.original_text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトが周囲の臭気を分析しようとして、軽い機能不全を起こしている。まるで何かが彼のオーグメティックに干渉しているかのようだ。…どうにも嫌な感じがする」

languages.text: "Bei Glaito treten einige kleine Fehler auf, wenn er versucht, die örtlichen Gerüche zu analysieren. Als würde etwas seine Augmentationen beeinträchtigen. Das gefällt mir gar nicht ..."
languages.original_text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."

traits.locale_text: "Bei Glaito treten einige kleine Fehler auf, wenn er versucht, die örtlichen Gerüche zu analysieren. Als würde etwas seine Augmentationen beeinträchtigen. Das gefällt mir gar nicht ..."

languages.text: « Glaito rencontre quelques dysfonctionnements mineurs en essayant d'analyser toutes ces odeurs, comme si quelque chose perturbait ses augmétiques. Ça ne me dit rien qui vaille... »
languages.original_text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito rencontre quelques dysfonctionnements mineurs en essayant d'analyser toutes ces odeurs, comme si quelque chose perturbait ses augmétiques. Ça ne me dit rien qui vaille... »

languages.text: «Glaito está experimentando ciertos fallos tratando de analizar los olores del entorno; es como si algo estuviese afectando a sus auméticos. Esto no me gusta nada de nada...».
languages.original_text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."

traits.locale_text: «Glaito está experimentando ciertos fallos tratando de analizar los olores del entorno; es como si algo estuviese afectando a sus auméticos. Esto no me gusta nada de nada...».

languages.text: “格雷托在分析气味时出了点小故障，似乎有什么东西影响到了它的植入物，这可不是什么好兆头……”
languages.original_text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."

traits.locale_text: “格雷托在分析气味时出了点小故障，似乎有什么东西影响到了它的植入物，这可不是什么好兆头……”

languages.text: "Glaito, yerel kokuları analiz etmeye çalışırken arızalandı. Sanki ogmetiği bir şeyden etkilenmiş gibiydi. Bu iş hiç mi hiç içime sinmiyor..."
languages.original_text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, yerel kokuları analiz etmeye çalışırken arızalandı, sanki ogmetiki bir şeyden etkilenmiş gibiydi. Bu iş, hiç içime sinmiyor..."

languages.original_text: "Glaito is having some minor malfunctions trying to analyse the local smells — as if something were affecting his augmetics. I do not like any of this..."
